items.title: iOS 26 update now seeding, here are all the iPhones getting it
items.summary: Apple is rolling out iOS 26 to users today. This is one of the biggest visual overhauls of the iPhone operating system to date, thanks to the introduction of the new Liquid Glass design. As usual, the update went live at 10AM PT/1PM ET/5PM UTC time to millions of users around the world at the same â€¦

items.title: ASRock's revamped AI Quickset WSL virtualization tool makes it easy to run Linux AI apps on Windows
items.summary: ASRock has developed a new iteration of its AI Quickset tool that provides users with an automated method of deploying Linux-based AI models on Windows with the help of virtualization.

items.title: Surrey pace pair run through Notts

items.title: 'There is, and always will be, only one Ricky Hatton'
items.summary: Former boxing world champion Ricky Hatton, who has died aged 46, achieved all he dreamed of and more, writes Chris McKenna.

items.title: Apple iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and Air hot take
items.summary: Apple's self-dubbed 'awe dopping' September 9 event brought no big surprises, but it still left us with some thoughts. It also brought some nostalgia back to our hearts for the good old times when we collectively held our breath in excited anticipation of what Apple's new iPhone would be. The last â€¦

items.title: How 'phoenix' Seville ushered in new era for Jamaican sprinting
items.summary: Oblique Seville ends Jamaica's nine-year wait for a global 100m title with his hero Usain Bolt watching on at the World Athletics Championships in Tokyo.

items.title: 'Etched into British sporting folklore' - Hatton's life in pictures
items.summary: BBC Sport looks at some of the most striking images from Ricky Hatton's boxing career, as the sport mourns following his death.

items.title: 'People's champion who fought with every part of his soul'
items.summary: British boxer Ricky Hatton is remembered as a "warrior" who became the "people's champion" as the sporting world reacts to his death.

items.title: 'Like an extra signing' - Kerr back with a bang after 637 days
items.summary: Chelsea goalkeeper Hannah Hampton says having Sam Kerr back after 20 months out with an injury will be "a big help for us going forward".

items.title: This Gigabyte Aero 16X deal is the most affordable RTX 5070-powered laptop at just $1,199
items.summary: The Aero 16X from Gigabyte is a solid 16-inch notebook powered by AMD and Nvidia's latest-gen chips

items.title: 5 Live Boxing with Steve Bunce
items.summary: Steve Bunce and Richie Woodhall react to the sad news about Ricky Hatton's death.

items.title: Windows 11 is getting a built-in internet speed test feature that will take you to Bing, along with multiple revamped settings pages â€” Latest Insider channel builds reveal prominent changes coming soon to the OS
items.summary: Windows 11 is set to get a built-in speed test option that will finally rid you of your reliance on websites like Ookla's Speedtest and Netflix's Fast... as long as you're okay with going to Bing to do the same thing. These new Insider channel builds also bring more changes like revamped settings pâ€¦

items.title: Deals: Galaxy Z Flip7 and Razr 2025 discounted, Apple watches and headphones on pre-order
items.summary: Apple unveiled its next-gen phones this week and they are now on pre-order in the first wave of countries with a release scheduled for September 19. That would be Friday next week â€“ in the meantime, letâ€™s look at some alternatives. We will focus on one kind of alternative â€“ flip foldables. Apple drâ€¦

items.title: Nvidia rumored to ditch its first-gen custom memory form factor for newer version â€” SOCAMM1 for faster â€˜SOCAMM2â€™ standard
items.summary: Nvidia has reportedly cancelled its first-gen SOCAMM (System-on-Chip Attached Memory Module) rollout and is shifting development focus to a new version known as SOCAMM2.

items.title: Cougar introduces â€˜floatingâ€™ mid-tower PC case â€” separates drives and power supply from main chamber for more efficient cooling
items.summary: Cougar just released a case that allows for air to enter between the PSU and the rest of the system, ensuring more efficient air and water cooling.

items.title: IBM announced the worldâ€™s first HDD, the 3.75MB RAMAC 350 disk storage unit, 69 years ago today â€” unit weighed more than a ton, 50 platters ran at 1,200 RPM
items.summary: On this day in 1956, IBM announced the RAMAC 350 Disk Storage Unit, packing an awe-inspiring 3.75MB of data across 50 magnetic platters, each spanning 24-inches in diameter and spinning at 1,200 RPM.

items.title: China launches anti-dumping probe into U.S. analog chips used in PCs and routers
items.summary: China has launched an anti-dumping investigation into American-made analog chips, claiming U.S. manufacturers have undercut local vendors on price while flooding the market with mature-node parts.

items.title: Hacker breaks into on-campus smart washing machines â€” management eventually disables devices, leaving thousands of students with no reliable laundry service
items.summary: A hacker breaks into the digital washing machines of a student residence in Amsterdam and makes them free for all to use â€” but management catches up and deactivates the appliances altogether.

items.title: Acer Predator Connect T7 mesh router review: Expensive and outclassed
items.summary: The Predator Connect T7 is easily overshadowed by far superior and less expensive Wi-Fi 7 mesh routers.

items.title: TSM-Bee? TSMC gets into the honey business after working with local beekeepers to establish hives around its fabs
items.summary: TSMC has worked with local beekeepers in Taiwan to produce â€˜Ji Miâ€™ â€“ TSMC branded honey.

items.title: Enthusiast builds entire PC setup with Lego-style bricks â€” Includes desktop terminal-style OLED monitor & keyboard, with an iPhone 6-powered desk clock
items.summary: An enthusiast has showcased a workstation built using Lego-style bricks. Featuring a PC case, a desktop terminal with an OLED monitor, and a mechanical keyboard, this setup is truly unique in its creativity. It only has a 5600G inside with no dedicated GPU, however.

items.title: Apple unveils iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max, iPhone 17 Air, Week 37 in review
items.summary: Just as planned, Apple unveiled its much-anticipated iPhone 17 series, and it was an eventful event. The iPhone 17 Pro and 17 Pro Max debuted a fresh new aluminum unibody design - a major departure from the flat look the iPhone had since the iPhone 12 back in 2020. The design features a new camera â€¦

items.title: 'Crawford conquers Canelo to become the face of boxing'
items.summary: Terence Crawford's win over Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez was a career-defining, legacy-cementing, history-making performance, writes BBC Sport's Kal Sajad.

items.title: Compromised Google Calendar invites can hijack ChatGPTâ€™s Gmail connector and leak emails
items.summary: A security researcher has demonstrated how a malicious Google Calendar invite can prompt-inject ChatGPT and coax it into leaking private emails once Google connectors are enabled.

items.title: Nintendo revives Virtual Boy after 30 years for the Switch and Switch 2 â€” lets you play 3D Nintendo Classics titles to bring back the nostalgia
items.summary: Nintendo is reviving the Virtual Boy 3D console with an accessory that accepts your Switch or Switch 2 handheld.

items.title: Spacious 24TB hard drive is available for a mere 1 cent per GB â€” Seagate's BarraCuda 24TB is back on sale for $249
items.summary: This Seagate BarraCuda 24TB HDD is available at Newegg for $249â€”one of its best prices to date and an excellent deal for anyone in need of storage.
